text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Trump, who declared his intention to “suspend immigration” in a late-night tweet on Monday, has backed off plans to also halt guest worker programs that bring farm laborers, high-tech employees and others to the United States using special visas.
https://t.co/c7otfokInC
